root.title: u.k money market give help new rate
root.body: bank england say provid market assist afternoon buy bill worth 166 mln stg low rate introduc morn bought 45 mln stg local author bill plu 27 mln stg bank bill band one 10-3/8 pct togeth 94 mln stg band two bank bill 10-5/16 pct bank also revis estim market shortag 300 mln stg 250 mln morn give total assist 213 mln stg today
